attributes.action: Relocate the British Parliament from London to unite the union
attributes.additional_details: We call on the Goverment to relocate the current London Westminster parliament to a border region with scotland to strengthen the union between the 2 states. Currently westminster is to far away from people North of the border.london as now become a place were it does not represent the majority of the British people.We also call on the London Parliament to become the english parliament.
